result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Marquise Bradley in court.  Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court for Michael Marquise Bradley.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael Marquise Bradley in court.  Attorney Tristan Bednarek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Pre-trial conference held. Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. John Krejci to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month beginning at the completion of the case, and then the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

CORRECTION TO ENTRY MADE ON 08/26/2022:  Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 4 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $750.00.  If Alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with KKM (dob 3/22/1986)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $750.00.  If Alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Michael Marquise Bradley appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Michael Marquise Bradley.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty. DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  Pretrial Conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm. This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Marquise Bradley
Current: 8921 N Swan Rd Unit B, Milwaukee, WI 53224 United States  (Effective: 08-26-2022)
Prior: 2130 East Locust Street #4, Milwaukee, WI 53211
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
